title: Runner submits snapshots and final report Snapshot

view.title: Runner submits snapshots and final report
view.subtitle: Final report artifact submitted.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Licensed Digital Product Sale with Key Issuance. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Rate limiting on auth endpoints". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.
